Sentencas: Fuel cells offer a promising way to produce electricity efficiently.
Titulo: Investigation of direct carbon conversion at the surface of a YSZ electrolyte in a SOFC

Sentencas: In this work, a direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC) based on a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been investigated, in which solid carbon has been used as fuel in form of a pellet.
Titulo: Investigation of direct carbon conversion at the surface of a YSZ electrolyte in a SOFC

Sentencas: The DCFC is an interesting technology because it offers the possibility to use, as fuel source, available and abundant raw materials with only minor pretreatment.

Sentencas: Moreover, the thermodynamic efficiency slightly exceeds 100% in a wide temperature range due to the positive near-zero value of reaction entropy change.

Sentencas: As pure carbon dioxide is produced at the anode, it can be easily captured and sequestered.

Sentencas: Direct carbon conversion is competed by the Boudouard reaction, which produces carbon monoxide at high operating temperatures.
